tool.name: recetox-aplcms - compute clusters
tool.description: compute clusters of mz and rt across samples and assign cluster IDs to individual features

configfiles.configfile:
#set filenames = str("', '").join([str($f) for $f in $files]) feature_tables <- load_parquet_collection(c('$filenames')) sample_names <- unlist(lapply(feature_tables, load_sample_name))
validate_sample_names(sample_names)
ordering <- order(sample_names) feature_tables <- feature_tables[ordering] sample_names <- sample_names[ordering]
clusters <- compute_clusters_simple( feature_tables = feature_tables, sample_names = sample_names, mz_tol_ppm = $mz_tol_relative_ppm, rt_tol = $rt_tol )
save_parquet_collection(clusters, sample_names, "clustered")
